comments.content: Wow, impressive work! Though I noticed a minor issue with the drag feature. Overall, it's incredible. Your design skills are spot on, and the responsiveness across different screen sizes is impeccable.
This is amazing! How long have you been coding? I'm just starting out and thinking about diving into React. Any suggestions on where I should start learning?

replies.content: As a beginner, it's crucial to focus on the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript before delving into React. Establishing a strong foundation will serve you well.
I couldn't agree more. In this fast-paced tech world, it's easy to get caught up in the latest trends. However, mastering the fundamentals is key to long-term success.
